name: Minimum Damage Bonus(b)
comment: Seems to be redundant to mod 21. Found on Steel runeword.

comment: Seems to be redundant to mod 22. Found on Steel runeword.

name: Fire Damage X-Y
comment: Min and Max

name: Cold Damage X-Y-Z
comment: Min, Max and Duration in frames. D2 runs at 25fps.

name: Poison damage X-Y over duration Z
comment: Min X, Max Y. Both state the amount of damage this poison causes over roughly 10 seconds, and 256 frames. Z is the duration in frames. D2 runs at 25fps.

name: Increase Maximum Durability
comment: Works on items as absolute bonus, and remains invisible in mods list.

name: Increase Maximum Durability
comment: Seems to be a superiority modification for, e.g., superior armor.

name: Attacker takes Damage
comment: Thorns.

comment: The 7i seems to be simply ‚1000000‘.

name: All Skills Bonus (Class specific)
comment: First param is character class id, second is global skill bonus.

name: Requirements Reduction
comment: Requirements Percentage. Positive. Example value: 20%, will be displayed as -80%

name: oskill
comment: First param is skill id. Second is lvl bonus.

name: skill
comment: First param is skill id. Second is lvl bonus.
